about_the_game:
Duck, Duckson's father, takes him to Town, capital of the Duck Kingdom and home of the Duck King. Duckson wants to become the greatest Duck Knight ever. To fullfill his dream, he must explore a peculiar town, full of mysteries and weird places, meet a bunch of quirky villagers and prove that he is worth the title.

Duck in Town - A Rising Knight is the first chapter in this series of comedy 3D graphic adventure games, heavily inspired by the classics of the genre.

Features


  • Explore Town, capital of the Duck Kingdom
  • Enjoy an unique story full of funny dialogs
  • Join the Duck Guild
  • Play as a cute duck
  • Discover the mysteries of the recent Pigeon War
  • Win the squawk contest
  • Did I mention ducks?
detailed_description:
Duck, Duckson's father, takes him to Town, capital of the Duck Kingdom and home of the Duck King. Duckson wants to become the greatest Duck Knight ever. To fullfill his dream, he must explore a peculiar town, full of mysteries and weird places, meet a bunch of quirky villagers and prove that he is worth the title.

Duck in Town - A Rising Knight is the first chapter in this series of comedy 3D graphic adventure games, heavily inspired by the classics of the genre.

Features


  • Explore Town, capital of the Duck Kingdom
  • Enjoy an unique story full of funny dialogs
  • Join the Duck Guild
  • Play as a cute duck
  • Discover the mysteries of the recent Pigeon War
  • Win the squawk contest
  • Did I mention ducks?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or equivalent (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 630 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or equivalent (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4150 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra 10.12.6
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 @ 2.7 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS High Sierra 10.13.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 @ 3.1 GHz or higher
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780M or higher

short_description: Duckson arrives at Town with one dream: to become the greatest Duck Knight ever. Play as a cute duck, explore the town, meet its quirky villagers and win the squawk contest in this comedy graphic adventure!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
